summary: An email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York to an unspecified recipient, forwarding an order from Judge Nathan and requesting a call to discuss. The order directs MDC legal to file a letter with the court by Friday.

persons.name: Judge Nathan
persons.context: Issued an order directing MDC legal to file a letter with the court by Friday.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: Author of the email, forwarding Judge Nathan's order and requesting a call to discuss the matter.

events.title: Email correspondence regarding court order
events.description: An Assistant United States Attorney emails an unspecified recipient to forward an order from Judge Nathan and requests a call to discuss.

events.title: Deadline for MDC legal letter filing
events.description: Judge Nathan's order directs MDC legal to file a letter with the court by Friday, December 4, 2020.

locations: One Saint Andrew's Plaza, New York, NY 10007
keyFacts: Judge Nathan issued an order directing MDC legal to file a letter with the court by a specific Friday.
An Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York forwarded this order via email on December 2, 2020, and requested a call to discuss.
The correspondence indicates ongoing legal proceedings requiring action from MDC (Metropolitan Detention Center) legal staff.
